name: Glitch Ball
description:
You must adapt to survive in this glitchy Pong clone.

The first player to 10 wins the match. 1P mode has five difficulty levels to conquer.

Press space to start the game.

1P moves with w,a,s,d.

2P moves with the arrows.

Press esc to pause.

Credit for the font goes to SaintsNever.
